availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Perry (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of James Perry and Rebecca Perry. Married to Theresa Perry. Father of Nancy Ella Perry, Haden Perry, and Martha Perry. Laborer and student in Kanawha County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Kanawha County, District 29, p. 72A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 247.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, West Virginia, Wayne County, Butler, p. 23A.
